stdout:
Table	Create Table
prices	CREATE TABLE `prices` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `apiId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `countryId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `serviceId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `smshubPrice` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `ourPrice` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `quantityAvailable` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `lastSync` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `country_service_idx` (`countryId`,`serviceId`),
  KEY `last_sync_idx` (`lastSync`),
  KEY `idx_prices_country_service` (`countryId`,`serviceId`),
  KEY `api_idx` (`apiId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=180001
